page.description: Create a temporary table from a SQL statement.
page.syntax: P tbl = Table.SQL_Open(C connection,C selectStatement [,L portable, [sql::arguments Args ]])

section.title: Examples
section.example: dim t as p t = table.sql_open("::Name::Alphasports","select * from customer",.t.) ? t.fields_get() = 21 ? t.FIRSTNAME = "James " ? t.LASTNAME = "Mahoney " ? t.filename_get() = "C:\Users\Cian\AppData\Local\Temp\$$504B.dbf" t.close()

section.description: Note that the files go away after the table is closed.
